content: **update ** new and exciting uses for these scrunchies -shawl pin -scarf cuff click here to check out the videos i made to show how to easily use this for this new use 1 **crochet scrunchies are all the rage** are scrunchies all the rage these days ever hear of a vsco girl i hadn t but apparently they love to wear hair scrunches so hop on the trend **give hyperbolic crochet a try** hyperbolic crochet creates ruffled surfaces by exponentially increasing the number of stitches in each row in this pattern we have just one row of increases but even with that the ripples are amazing keep tuned for another hyperbolic crochet pattern coming very soon **hyperbolic crochet origins** this is a simple and easy introduction to hyperbolic crochet which was developed in 1997 by daina taimina cornell university mathematician she was trying to create a physical model of hyperbolic space which has the quality that as you move away from any point the space around it expands exponentially pretty deep here s a link if you re curious about the math http //www theiff org/oexhibits/oe1e html 2 otherwise enjoy making this quick and easy hyperbolic crochet scrunchie **materials use and more info** http //www lightandjoydesigns com/2019/11/02/learn-to-make-a-hyperbolic-crochet-hair-scrunchie-vsco-girls-approved/ 3 let me know your thoughts in the comments and share your pics here or on instagram or fb #hyperbolicscrunchie 4 **crochet along -
